message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get slightly more since I'm making the first move.
I took the first rejection, now it's your turn!
Okay Bob, let's be real. 50/50 is the fairest split. Take it or leave it!
You didn't take my previous offer, now I want more!
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise slightly. This is your last chance for a good deal!
